data.title: SevOne Automated Network Observability Sales Foundation
data.meta_description: Credly is a global Open Badge platform that closes the gap between skills and opportunities. We work with academic institutions, corporations, and professional associations to translate learning outcomes into digital credentials that are immediately validated, managed, and shared.
data.text:
This badge earner can articulate the value of SevOne Automated Network Observability, providing app-centric network observability to NetOps and engineering teams to spot, prevent and address performance issues in hybrid environments. They can link the value of network performance to user application experience. By leveraging ML-driven analytics, users can proactively monitor multi-vendor networks and automate actions based on insights for enterprise, communication, and managed service providers.

Type Validation

Level Foundational

Time Days

Cost Free

Additional Details
